Amendment of clause 9: —Indian Stamp (Uttarakhand Amendment) Bill, 2011 (as passed by the 
Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly on dated 16 March, 2011) clause 9 shall be substituted as follows; 
namely :—

Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly on dated 16 March, 2011) clause 9 shall be substituted as follows; 
namely :— 
“Voting or attempting to vote under any proxy not duly stamped shall for every offence, be punishable 
with fine which may extend to ₹ five thousand.” 
[Vide Uttarakhand Act 20 of 2013, s. 2]
